attributes.action: Nominate Ian Paisley and Gerry Adams for the Noble Peace Prize
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We Think Ian Paisley and Gerry Adams should be nominated for the Noble Peace Prize .Very few people ever thought they would see them ,Work together in hope and peace .For the future of Northern Ireland .A New Beginning A New Start With the help of God  A Permanent Peace One Day At A Time
